text: Noel Kelly (22 January 1936 â€“ 14 June 2020) was an Australian professional rugby league footballer and coach. Kelly played at club, state and national level. He has been named among the country's best footballers of the 20th century. Century's Top 100 Players Kelly played as a hooker, prop forward or lock for much of his career with the Western Suburbs Magpies. He played for in three consecutive NSWRFL grand finals from 1961 to 1963. Kelly was named at hooker of the Western Suburbs Magpies, Queensland and Australian teams of the 20th century. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Australian rugby league players Category:Sportspeople from Queensland
title: Noel Kelly (rugby league)
